fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3

Class GlobalSupervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e3.GlobalSupervisor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI

    public class GlobalSupervisor
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
    The class GlobalSupervisor implements the supervisor component for simulated runs of the HEM project.

    Description

    In BCM4Java-CyPhy, simulated runs execute both the components and their DEVS simulators. In this case, the supervisor component is responsible for the creation, initialisation and start of execution of the global component simulation architecture using models disseminated into the different application components.

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-11-13

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
